comment: This one is for Clarence Spangle. He has a great fondness for British music and he just fuckin' loves the English. Hope ya like it CS.
amr:
# ::snt This one is for Clarence Spangle. He has a great fondness for British music and he just fuckin' loves the English. Hope ya like it CS.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / favor-01
            :ARG0 (o / one
                  :mod (t / this))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Clarence"
                        :op2 "Spangle")))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (h2 / he)
                  :ARG1 (f2 / fondness
                        :mod (g / great)
                        :topic (m2 / music
                              :mod (c / country
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Britain")))))
            :op2 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 h2
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "England")))
                  :mod (j / just)
                  :mod (f3 / fuck)))
      :snt3 (h3 / hope-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (l2 / like-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "CS"))
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it))))

comment: Please do not use homophobic terms.
amr:

(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (t / term
            :mod (h / homophobia)))

comment: I hope that you can see how your bigotry is depriving you of things that you could be enjoying.
amr:

(h / hope-01

      :ARG1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (d / deprive-01
                        :ARG0 (b / bigotry
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (e / enjoy-01
                                    :ARG0 y
                                    :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01)))
                        :ARG2 y))))
